TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TemplateGroupCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
Public NotInheritable Class TemplateGroupCollection Implements IList
public ref class TemplateGroupCollection sealed : System::Collections::IList
type TemplateGroupCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 代表控制項設計工具中的 物件集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects within a control designer.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別，且任何衍生的類別，定義屬性設為物件。The class, and any derived class, defines the property as a object. 屬性通常僅供設計主應用程式這類[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]。The property is typically used only by a design host such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]. 當物件加入集合以動態方式增加的大小。The collection dynamically increases in size as objects are added. 這個集合中的索引都是以零為起始的。Indexes in this collection are zero-based. 使用若要判定集合中有多少群組的屬性。Use the property to determine how many groups are in the collection. 此外，使用方法和屬性，以提供下列功能：Additionally, use the methods and properties to provide the following functionality: - 方法，將單一的群組加入至集合。The method to add a single group to the collection. - 方法，將群組加入集合中的特定索引處。The method to add a group at a particular index within the collection. - 移除群組的方法。The method to remove a group. - 方法來移除特定索引處的群組。The method to remove the group at a particular index. - 方法，以判斷特定的群組是否已在集合中。The method to determine whether a particular group is already in the collection. - 方法來擷取集合中群組的索引。The method to retrieve the index of a group within the collection. - 来取得或設定群組中使用陣列標記法的特定索引處的索引子。The indexer to get or set the group at a particular index, using array notation. - 方法，將多個群組加入至集合。The method to add multiple groups to the collection. 您可以新增多個群組，為群組或做為陣列物件，擷取透過的另一個控制項設計工具的屬性。You can add multiple groups either as an array of groups or as a object that you retrieve through the property of another control designer. - 方法從集合移除所有群組。The method to remove all groups from the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何定義簡單的控制項設計工具衍生自類別。The following code example demonstrates how to define a simple control designer that is derived from the class. 衍生的控制項設計工具會實作取得範本群組所定義的基底類別，並新增範本群組的特定衍生的控制項設計工具的屬性。The derived control designer implements the property by getting the template groups that are defined for the base class and adding a template group that is specific to the derived control designer. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection/CS/templategroupcollectionsample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection/VB/templategroupcollectionsample.vb#1)]

summary.span: 判斷集合中是否包含指定的群組。

span.span: Determines whether the specified group is contained within the collection.

returns.span: 如果 位於集合中，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the is in the collection; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會判斷使用的相等方法物件。The method determines equality by using the method on the objects. 方法會執行線性搜尋; 因此，平均執行時間成正比屬性。The method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to the property. 因為樣板群組集合通常很小，線性搜尋作業的效能，並不重要。Because template group collections typically are small, the performance of the linear search operation is not critical.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Count As Integer
public: property int Count { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得集合中 物件的數目。

span.span: Gets the number of objects in the collection.

value.span: 集合中的 物件數目。

span.span: The number of objects in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常使用屬性來判斷範圍上限索引時逐一查看集合中的物件。The property generally is used to determine the upper boundary index when iterating through objects in the collection. 第一個項目集合的索引是以零為起始的因為位於索引`0`中的索引處的最後一個元素，而且`Count-1`。Because the collection indexes are zero-based, the first element is at index `0` and the last element is at index `Count-1`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會將集合中特定索引位置處的物件。The method adds a object to the collection at a specific index location. 若要新增單一集合的結尾，以使用方法。To add a single to the end of the collection, use the method. 若要加入集合中的多個群組，請使用方法。To add multiple groups to the collection, use the method. > [!NOTE] > 當您將項目插入集合時，後續的項目集合中索引將會變更。When you insert an item into the collection, the indexes change for subsequent items in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用擷取在指定群組的索引子`index`集合中，或將群組設定在指定`index`集合中。Use the indexer to retrieve the group at a specified `index` within the collection or to set the group at a specified `index` within the collection. 您可以使用陣列標記法索引集合中的項目。You can index elements in the collection by using array notation. 例如，您可以在此索引中的索引處的項目`i`加上標記法`TemplateGroups(i)`的 Microsoft VisualBasic 或`TemplateGroups[i]`適用於 C#。For example, you can index an element at index `i` with the notation `TemplateGroups(i)` for Microsoft VisualBasic or `TemplateGroups[i]` for C#. 當您有群組物件的參考，而且需要在集合中物件的索引時，使用方法。When you have a reference to the group object and need the index of the object in the collection, use the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Remove(class System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup group) cil managed

span.span: The to remove from the collection.

summary.span: 從集合中移除指定的 物件。

span.span: Removes the specified object from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會移除第一個出現`group`從集合。The method removes the first occurrence of `group` from the collection. 如果物件不包含`group`，集合會保持不變。If the object does not contain `group`, the collection remains unchanged. 不會有例外狀況擲回。No exception is thrown. 方法會判斷使用的相等方法物件。The method determines equality by using the method on the objects. 方法會執行線性搜尋; 因此，平均執行時間成正比屬性。The method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to the property. 因為樣板群組集合通常很小，線性搜尋作業的效能，並不重要。Because template group collections typically are small, the performance of the linear search operation is not critical. 若要從集合中移除特定索引處的群組，使用方法。To remove a group at a particular index from the collection, use the method. 若要從集合移除所有群組，請使用方法。To remove all the groups from the collection, use the method. > [!NOTE] > 當您從集合移除項目時，在集合中的後續項目索引將會變更。When you remove an item from the collection, the indexes change for subsequent items in the collection.
